response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe aligns perfectly with your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will significantly benefit your endeavors. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at a special price of $1,200,000. This represents a significant saving compared to the market value, making it a highly attractive proposition. Should you decide to proceed, please let me know, and we can arrange the details promptly. I look forward to the possibility of working with you and bringing this valuable asset into your possession.", "product_price": 1200000}
